name: places/ChIJPzTZVWP2wokRSJTMSPxaR6k
formattedAddress: 1691 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1691 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Before the holidays, my daughter wanted her hair cut & highlighted. I only had time on a Sunday and Santa was the only place open nearby with no appointment needed. We took a chance since we only just moved here a few months ago and I'm so happy we did. Santa handled my daughter's hair with so much care and professionalism. She walked us thru the entire process since reddish highlights are tricky and she did a great job. We can't wait to go back for touchups and perhaps something new for me. I highly recommend

originalText.text: I love Santa!!! I’ve been coming to her since I was 5 years old she was the first person to do my hair and I’m still coming here. I try to stay on the natural path but always come back to show love. She’s amazing with color and will make you look your best. Stop on by and tell em Dorothy sent you

originalText.text: I have been coming to Santa's for 5 years now, even though I have moved to another borough.  Santa is the only one I let color, cut or relax my hair!  Santa is amazing with color and highlights.  No frills place with great friendly service. Cash only.

originalText.text: Best Hair Salon in Harlem, I've been coming here for years. I love Santa she's a beautiful person with a good heart. You will not find a better hair salon than Santa's in Harlem

text.text: Best Hair Salon in Harlem, I've been coming here for years. I love Santa she's a beautiful person with a good heart. You will not find a better hair salon than Santa's in Harlem

originalText.text: The both the owner and the workers are extremely friendly and mindful. I love the way the style my hair. I've never had a bad experience at this hair salon. They definitely put their customers first.
